MAIN_MESSAGE: The electricity supply to your premises may currently be affected by planned work.  You should have received a letter explaining this.  We hope to be able to restore your supplies by 08-NOV-2020 09:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience this is causing.
